meanings.definition: Holy objects or places considered sacred
meanings.sent1: The holies in the church were kept in a special room.
meanings.sent2: People visit the holies in the temple to pray.
meanings.sent3: The holies seemed to glow with a mysterious light.
meanings.sent4: She treated the holies as if they held magical powers.
meanings.sent5: The holies were surrounded by an aura of peace and tranquility.

meanings.definition: The most sacred part of a temple or church
meanings.sent1: The holies of the temple were off-limits to the public.
meanings.sent2: The priest carefully guarded the holies of the church.
meanings.sent3: The holies were so revered that even the bravest dared not enter.
meanings.sent4: The holies stood like a beacon of purity amidst the chaos.
meanings.sent5: The holies exuded a sense of divine presence that filled the room.

meanings.definition: A term used to express reverence or awe
meanings.sent1: They whispered in hushed tones, referring to the holies.
meanings.sent2: The holies were spoken of with great respect by all.
meanings.sent3: He bowed his head in acknowledgment of the holies.
meanings.sent4: The holies inspired a sense of wonder and humility in all who saw them.
meanings.sent5: In the presence of the holies, silence fell like a heavy blanket over the room.
